title: Whispers of the Dusk
author: Aria Blackthorn
description: In a world where shadows carry secrets, a lone historian unearths a forgotten prophecy that could bring ruin—or redemption—to the realm. As dusk descends, whispers from the past grow louder, beckoning her toward a truth long buried.

title: Beneath Crimson Moons
author: Lucian Wren
description: Two moons bleed crimson over a land on the edge of war. When a rogue knight and a cursed seer cross paths, their fates intertwine in a rebellion against an empire built on lies and blood magic.

title: The Last Ember King
author: Seraphina Vale
description: The final heir to a long-extinct line of fire-wielders must reclaim his throne to stop an eternal winter. But first, he must survive the betrayal of those closest to him—and the rising dark within himself.

title: Echoes in the Fog
author: Dorian Ash
description: When a coastal town is enveloped in an unending fog, haunting memories begin to resurface. A grieving detective must face his past and follow the echoes into a mystery that defies time and death.

title: Garden of Hollow Stars
author: Lyra Stone
description: In a floating garden above a dying world, a botanist discovers celestial flora with the power to grant memories. But as the stars flicker out, she must decide which memories are worth saving—and which are best left forgotten.

title: The Clockmaker’s Heir
author: Thorne Everhart
description: A young apprentice discovers he is the heir to an ancient guild of timekeepers. With time unraveling around him, he must master the gears of fate to prevent a war that could erase history itself.

title: Shadowveil
author: Isolde Myrr
description: Beneath the capital’s glamour lies Shadowveil, a hidden district where nightmares come to life. A runaway noble must brave its darkness to uncover the truth about her cursed bloodline and reclaim her stolen legacy.

title: Voices Beyond the Vale
author: Elias Vex
description: After a near-death experience, a reclusive scholar begins to hear voices from the dead. As he investigates the veil between life and death, he uncovers a conspiracy that could silence the afterlife forever.

title: The Dream Eater’s Pact
author: Nyra Solace
description: A girl born with the ability to devour nightmares is bound to a dream demon. Together, they forge a pact to defeat a cult that feeds on the dreams of innocents—but at a cost neither is prepared to pay.

title: A Season of Ashes
author: Malachai Ember
description: In a kingdom where every autumn brings death, a young alchemist seeks the truth behind the curse. With the leaves turning and ash falling once more, she races against time to find the source—or perish like the rest.

title: Crows of the Sapphire Gate
author: Vesper Dawn
description: When a sacred gate is breached, harbingers in the form of crows descend upon the realm. A disgraced priestess and a hunted assassin must unite to restore the seal before the underworld consumes everything.

title: Lanterns of the Forgotten
author: Caelum Rhodes
description: Each year, souls forgotten by history light a lantern in the forest. When a young boy’s lantern is missing, he journeys into the woods to uncover the truth—and discovers a realm where memories are currency.

title: The Hollow Crown
author: Elira Fane
description: A tyrant wears a crown forged from lies. A rebel queen rises with a claim to the throne and a weapon from the old gods. In a realm torn by war, one will wear the hollow crown—and one will burn.

title: Fable of the Iron Sea
author: June Haupt
description: On a sea where ships are built from bones and storms whisper names, a pirate captain seeks the lost fable said to unlock immortality. But in the Iron Sea, legends have teeth—and they bite back.
